Equipment Actions.Action 1: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Longbow, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 150/600ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing, can also Poison the target

Other Actions.Action 2: Parry, The Erinyes adds to its AC against an attack it can see by a melee weapon by parrying the attack

Abilities.Ability 1: Hellish Weapons, The Erinyes' weapon attacks are magical and deal an Average 13 Poison damage on a hit
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
